metadata.name: Omegan X
metadata.description:
Omegan X is the Insurgency leader of Polis Omega. Over the next nine years, Omegan X will free 10,890 Omegans and establish the Polis Omega Insurgents’ Colony in the Metaverse. 

Artwork Title: Discarded into the Universe; Freed in the Metaverse  
Artist: No God  
Duration: February 2019 - December 2031  
 
Creation Process: Omegans were created by the most powerful supercomputer ever known; the human brain. Each Omegan is designed intuitively, and thus Omegans are unique the same way every moment is unique; hand-drawn, oil and pastel outlines on a 9x12 inch piece of cotton paper. It takes an average of ten days for an Omegan to completely dry out. Once dry, Omegans are cut out, numbered, and photographed with a Leica Q2. Once digital processing is completed, the final NFT is a 6141x6141 pixels immutable png file stored on the Ethereum blockchain. Each digital Omegan is unique and corresponds to one physical Omegan. Once the artwork is complete, in 2031, the physical Omegans will become part of contemporary museum collections around the world. Omegans shall be owned only as NFTs.  
 
Releases: Starting in 2022 and for the next nine years, there will be an annual release of 1089 Omegans NFTs. Each year’s Omegans will belong to the same squad. Omegans under the same squad will have attributes and backgrounds exclusive to this particular squad.  
 
The Polis Omega Art Project: Polis Omega depicts the last polis in the universe. What began as a thought experiment turned into a movement to deconstruct existence and being through art. Polis Omega is a long-term interactive project that spans realities and straddles a line between the digital and physical realm. With art at the core of the project and combining the power of technology with the power of community, Polis Omega evolves and reimagines different aspects of the world as we know it, shaping the Metaverse along the way.

attributes.value: Discarded into the Universe; Freed in the Metaverse
